meanings.definition: The art or science of agriculture.
meanings.sent1: Geoponics involves studying the best ways to grow crops.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use geoponics to improve their harvests.
meanings.sent3: The geoponics class had a field trip to a local farm.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to geoponics was as deep as the roots of the plants.
meanings.sent5: Learning about geoponics made him appreciate the hard work of farmers.

meanings.definition: The cultivation of plants in soil.
meanings.sent1: Geoponics focuses on growing plants in the ground.
meanings.sent2: In geoponics, soil quality is crucial for plant growth.
meanings.sent3: The geoponics experiment yielded a bountiful harvest.
meanings.sent4: Her love for geoponics blossomed like the flowers in her garden.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of geoponics lies in watching seeds transform into thriving plants.
